title: The Unseen Shield: The Tale of Jin Perez
summary: Jin Perez, a 73-year-old superhero, uses her special abilities of creating protective shields through prayers and baking to save her town from various threats over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Jin Perez, eine 73-jährige Superheldin, nutzt ihre besonderen Fähigkeiten, Schutzschilde durch Gebete und Backen zu erschaffen, um ihre Stadt im Laufe einer Woche vor verschiedenen Bedrohungen zu retten.
summaryDutch: Jin Perez, een 73-jarige superheld, gebruikt haar speciale vaardigheden om beschermende schilden te creëren door gebeden en bakken om haar stad gedurende een week tegen verschillende bedreigingen te beschermen.
summaryFrench: Jin Perez, une super-héroïne de 73 ans, utilise ses capacités spéciales pour créer des boucliers protecteurs à travers les prières et la pâtisserie pour sauver sa ville de diverses menaces au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Jin bakes bread imbued with blessings, unknowingly thwarting a sinister plot meant to sow chaos at the local park.
After hearing rumors of impending danger, Jin spends her morning in deep prayer, which unknowingly creates a force field around the town's school just as a strange fog descends.
The fog clears and Jin's quick action is hailed by the community. She feels energized and spends the afternoon helping at a community bake sale.
Suspicious individuals are seen around town. Jin calmly bakes pies that release a calming aroma, quelling the brewing tensions and dissuading potential troublemakers.
News of Jin’s recent deeds spreads. Journalists flock to her bakery, but she humbly deflects attention, focusing on her prayers and pastries instead.
A nearby village requests Jin's help. She sends them baked goods that boost morale and fortify the townspeople against a mysterious illness.
As the week ends, Jin reflects on her role and responsibilities, realizing the impact of her quiet contributions towards the safety and happiness of her community.

ending: Jin Perez may not wear a cape, but to her town, she is a true hero.
moral: True heroism is found in the quiet acts of courage and love.
